byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and STEVE EDER

abstract: Review of former Florida Gov Jeb Bush's finances shows he built much of his personal wealth since leaving office in 2007 by offering his expertise to companies with interests in state; personal history could conflict with Bush's proposed limits on lobbying for departing members of House and Senate; Bush's net worth is estimated at between $19 million and $22 million.
lead_paragraph: A review of Mr. Bush’s finances shows that he has built his personal wealth with the help of companies that had business interests with Florida while he was governor.

headline.main: Report Traces Jeb Bush’s Ties to Companies That Had Business With Florida
headline.print_headline: Report Traces Bush’s Ties to Companies That Had Business With Florida

snippet: A review of Mr. Bush’s finances shows that he has built his personal wealth with the help of companies that had business interests with Florida while he was governor.
